creditline: Gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
description: large piece of hide with ties at top; separated strips of beads- five narrow strips with bands of color followed by wider strips with diamond and triangle designs; larger bead and bell pendants at bottom; "DOES ANYTHING" written and incised in green at top back
title: Wedding Blanket
